content:
Can you put the below list into a table with three columns, Theme, Sector, Description. Each item in the list is a Theme but the header for each separate list is a Sector. Description is to be left blank.

Retail and Consumer 
 · Alcoholic Beverages 
 · Appliance Manufacturing 
 · Casinos & Gaming 
 · E:Commerce 
 · Food Retailers & Distribution 
 · Household & Personal Products 
 · Meat, Poultry and Dairy 
 · Non-Alcoholic Beverages 
 · Pharmaceutical Retail 
 · Processed Food 
 · Restaurants 
 · Textiles 
 · Tobacco 
 · Toys & Sporting Goods 
 · Wholesalers 

Real Estate 
 · Agriculture 
 · Asset Managers [same as FS] 
 · Building Products 
 · Construction Materials 
 · Education 
 · Engineering & Construction Services 
 · Forest Management 
 · Hotels & Lodging 
 · Industrial and Logistics 
 · Leisure Facilities 
 · Real Estate: Health and Social Care [Managed Care] 
 · Real Estate: Non-Residential & REITs 
 · Real Estate: Residential 
 · Real Estate: Utilities & Power Generators 
 · Real Estate Services 

Energy / Utilities 
 · Biofuels and Alternate Fuels 
 · Coal Operations 
 · Fuel Cells & Industrial Batteries 
 · Hydrogen 
 · Iron & Steel Products 
 · Metals & Mining 
 · Nuclear 
 · Oil & Gas: Exploration 
 · Oil & Gas: Midstream 
 · Oil & Gas: Refining 
 · Oil & Gas: Services 
 · Solar 
 · Wind 
 · Waste Management 
 · Water & Utilities 

Financial Services 
 · Asset Managers 
 · Commercial Banking 
 · Retail Banking and Consumer Finance 
 · Insurance 
 · Investment Banking 
 · Mortgage Finance
